drinkRegister.instructions: Mix well. Garnish with Orange and Cherry. Enjoy

drinkRegister.name: Chocolate Monkey
drinkRegister.instructions: blend liqeuors with ice-cream, milk and syrup. pour into parfait glass, top with whipped cream and garnish with banana and cherry.

drinkRegister.name: Texas Sling
drinkRegister.instructions: Blend with Ice until smooth. Serve in a tulip glass, top with whip cream.

drinkRegister.name: A midsummernight dream
drinkRegister.instructions: Mix the strawberrys in a blender Pour it together with the vodka,kirch and strawberry liquer over ice in a shaker. Shake well and pour in a highballglass. Fill up with the Russchian water

drinkRegister.name: Zoksel
drinkRegister.instructions: No specific mixinginstructions, just poor every ingredient in one glass. The lemon goes with it.

drinkRegister.name: Fuzzy Asshole
drinkRegister.instructions: fill coffe mug half full of coffee. Fill the other half full of Peach Schnapps. Stir and drink while hot.

drinkRegister.name: Quick-sand
drinkRegister.instructions: Simply add the orange juice, quite a quick pour in order to mix the sambucca with the orange juice. The juice MUST have fruit pulp!

drinkRegister.name: Snakebite and Black
drinkRegister.instructions: Put blackcurrant squash in first up to about 1cm in glass. Then add the larger and cider one after another.

drinkRegister.name: Zimadori Zinger
drinkRegister.instructions: Pour Zima in a collins glass over ice and then pour the shot of Midori. Don't stir. Garnish with a cherry.

drinkRegister.name: Herbal flame
drinkRegister.instructions: Pour Hot Damn 100 in bottom of a jar or regular glass. Fill the rest of the glass with sweet tea. Stir with spoon, straw, or better yet a cinnamon stick and leave it in.

drinkRegister.name: Jamaican Coffee
drinkRegister.instructions: Stir the rum, coffee and water together. Top with the whipped cream. Sprinkle with a pinch of well ground coffee and drink with a straw.

drinkRegister.name: Mojito #3
drinkRegister.instructions: Put mint with lemon juice in a glas, mash the mint with a spoon, ice, rum & fill up with club soda. Top it with Angostura.

drinkRegister.name: Apricot punch
drinkRegister.instructions: Pour all ingrediants into a large punch bowl. Add ice and 4 oranges that are peeled and divided.

drinkRegister.name: B-52
drinkRegister.instructions: Layer ingredients into a shot glass. Serve with a stirrer.

drinkRegister.name: Zambeer
drinkRegister.instructions: Mix sambuca with rootbeer and stir. Add ice

drinkRegister.name: Americano
drinkRegister.instructions: Pour the Campari and vermouth over ice into glass, add a splash of soda water and garnish with half orange slice.

drinkRegister.name: Black Forest Shake
drinkRegister.instructions: In a blender put ice cubes, chocolate syrup, cherry brandy, vodka, and milk. Blend very well.

drinkRegister.name: GG
drinkRegister.instructions: Pour the Galliano liqueur over ice. Fill the remainder of the glass with ginger ale and thats all there is to it. You now have a your very own GG.

drinkRegister.name: Radler
drinkRegister.instructions: Pour beer into large mug, slowly add the 7-up (or Sprite).

drinkRegister.name: Mudslinger
drinkRegister.instructions: Add all contents to a large jug or punch bowl. Stir well!

drinkRegister.name: Campari Beer
drinkRegister.instructions: Use a 15 oz glass. Add Campari first. Fill with beer.

drinkRegister.name: Almond Chocolate Coffee
drinkRegister.instructions: Pour in order into coffee cup. Top with whipped creme and chocolate shcvings.

drinkRegister.name: Amaretto Stone Sour #3
drinkRegister.instructions: Shake sour mix, tequila and amaretto with ice. Strain into highball glass. Add a splash of OJ. Garnish with orange slice and a cherry.

drinkRegister.name: 9 1/2 Weeks
drinkRegister.instructions: Combine all ingredients in glass mixer. Chill and strain into Cocktail glass. Garnish with sliced strawberry.

drinkRegister.name: Absolutly Screwed Up
drinkRegister.instructions: Shake it up it tasts better that way, but you can stir it if you want. 6 of those and you will be wasted for the rest of the night.

drinkRegister.name: Whitecap Margarita
drinkRegister.instructions: Place all ingredients in a blender and blend until smooth. This makes one drink.

drinkRegister.name: Bellini Martini
drinkRegister.instructions:
Add ice cubes to shaker.
Add vodka.
Add peach schnapps.
Add peach nectar.
Shake.
Strain into glass.
Add lemon twist peel.

drinkRegister.name: Jitterbug
drinkRegister.instructions: Wet glass, dip rim in sugar. Then add Ice. Then add everything else. It's that simple!

drinkRegister.name: Moranguito
drinkRegister.instructions: first you put rhe absinthe, then put tequila, then put the Granadine syrup.

drinkRegister.name: Amaretto Sweet & Sour
drinkRegister.instructions: Fill the blender with 3/4 ice. Add sweet & sour mix to the top of the ice. Add about 1" of pineapple juice, 1/2" of melon liqeur, and 1/2 to 1/4" of amaretto. Then blend the mix until it is of margaritta consistency or thinner.

drinkRegister.name: Rum Runner
drinkRegister.instructions: Mix all ingredients in glass & add ice.

drinkRegister.name: H.D.
drinkRegister.instructions: Mix the whisky and Baileys Cream in a beer-glass (at least 50 cl). Fill the rest of the glass with coffee.

drinkRegister.name: The Evil Blue Thing
drinkRegister.instructions: Pour ingredients into glass, and drop in a blue whale! The blue whale isn't really necessary, but it makes the drink more "fun".

drinkRegister.name: Shark Attack
drinkRegister.instructions: Mix lemonade and water according to instructions on back of can. If the instructions say to add 4 1/3 cans of water do so. Mix into pitcher. Add 1 1/2 cup of Vodka (Absolut). Mix well. Pour into glass of crushed ice. Excellent!

drinkRegister.name: Jack's Vanilla Coke
drinkRegister.instructions: After pouring in your ingredients, and adding 3-5 ice cubes, according to taste. Stir the drink with a stirrer to get the Vanilla off the bottom.

drinkRegister.name: Apple Grande
drinkRegister.instructions: Chill both ingredients!! Mix in a tumbler and enjoy!

drinkRegister.name: Bleeding Surgeon
drinkRegister.instructions: Pour Shot of Rum over slice of orange. Fill the remaining space in glass half way full of surge or similar drink. Finish off glass with cranberry juice. Be carefull, warm surge may foam over the glass.

drinkRegister.name: Applejack
drinkRegister.instructions: Add all ingredients into mixing glass, chill and strain into cocktail glass

drinkRegister.name: Adam Bomb
drinkRegister.instructions: Add ice to blender (or to glass if prefer on the rocks) then fruit, and fruite juice depending on personal prefference then add the Rum, Vodka, Tequila, and triple sec. blend till smooth, rim glass with sugar or salt and pour mixture in. garnish with lemon or lime slice.

drinkRegister.name: Arizona Antifreeze
drinkRegister.instructions: Pour all ingredients into shot glass and slam !!!!

drinkRegister.name: Black and Brown
drinkRegister.instructions: CAREFULLY to avoid explosive head formation: Pour Beer glass half full of favorite rootbeer and top off with Guinness.

drinkRegister.name: A Piece of Ass
drinkRegister.instructions: Put ice in glass. Pour in shots. Fill with Sour Mix.

drinkRegister.name: Avalanche
drinkRegister.instructions: Mix in highball glass over ice, shake well.

drinkRegister.name: Brandon and Will's Coke Float
drinkRegister.instructions: Scoop two large scoops of vanilla ice-cream into frosted beer mug. Next, add 2 ounces Maker's Mark. Then, pour in coke. Gently stir and enjoy.

drinkRegister.name: Flaming Lamborghini
drinkRegister.instructions: Pour the Sambuca and Kahlua into the Cocktail Glass and give the drinker a straw. Pour the Baileys and Blue Curacao into two sepsrate shot glasses either side of the cocktail glass. Set light the concotion in the cocktail glass and start to drink through the straw (this drink should be drunk in one) , as the bottom of the glass is reached put out the fire by pouring the Baileys and Blue Curacao into the cocktail glass and keep drinking till it's all gone!!

drinkRegister.name: Zipperhead
drinkRegister.instructions: Fill glass with rocks, add straw before putting in liquor. Then add the ingredients in order, trying to keep layered as much as possible (i.e. Chambord on bottom, then Vodka, Then soda on top).

drinkRegister.name: A Gilligan's Island
drinkRegister.instructions: Shaken, not stirred!

drinkRegister.name: Kioki Coffee
drinkRegister.instructions: Stir. Add whipped cream to the top.

drinkRegister.name: Apple Pie with A Crust
drinkRegister.instructions: Just mix the two liquids and sprinkle in the cinnamon. Serve either cold or heated.

drinkRegister.name: Zorbatini
drinkRegister.instructions: Prepare like a Martini. Garnish with a green olive.

drinkRegister.name: Vodka Fizz
drinkRegister.instructions: Blend all ingredients, save nutmeg. Pour into large white wine glass and sprinkle nutmeg on top.

drinkRegister.name: Radioactive Long Island Iced Tea
drinkRegister.instructions: Pour all ingredients over ice in a very tall glass. Sip cautiously.

drinkRegister.name: Shot-gun
drinkRegister.instructions: Pour one part Jack Daneils and one part Jim Beam into shot glass then float Wild Turkey on top.

drinkRegister.name: Bible Belt
drinkRegister.instructions: Mix all ingredients, and pour over ice.

drinkRegister.name: Irish Curdling Cow
drinkRegister.instructions: Pour Irish Cream, Vodka, and Bourbon in a glass. Add some ice and mix in the orange juice.

drinkRegister.name: Sweet Tooth
drinkRegister.instructions: Put 2 shots Godiva Liquour into a glass, add as much or as little milk as you would like.

drinkRegister.name: Downshift
drinkRegister.instructions: Start with the Sprite. Next comes the tequila. After that, add the Minute Maid Fruit Punch, then float the 151. Rocks optional.

drinkRegister.name: Pink Penocha
drinkRegister.instructions: mix all ingredients into bowl keep iced stir frequently

drinkRegister.name: Orange Whip
drinkRegister.instructions: Pour ingredients over ice and stir.

drinkRegister.name: Bruised Heart
drinkRegister.instructions: Pour all ingredients in a mixing tin over ice, stir, and strain into shot glass

drinkRegister.name: Gideon's Green Dinosaur
drinkRegister.instructions: Add all ingredients in collins glass with ice and stir.

drinkRegister.name: A True Amaretto Sour
drinkRegister.instructions: Rub the rim of an old fashioned glass with lemon, and dip repeatedly into granulated sugar until it has a good "frosted" rim. Shake a jigger of Amaretto with the juice of 1/2 a lemon. Strain into glass and add ice. Garnish with a Marachino Cherry.

drinkRegister.name: Kool First Aid
drinkRegister.instructions: Add Kool Aid to a double shot glass, and top with rum. Slam and shoot.

drinkRegister.name: Irish Russian
drinkRegister.instructions: Add the ingredients in the order listed in the recipe. Care must be taken when adding the Guinness to prevent an excess of foam. Do Not add ice.

drinkRegister.name: Auburn Headbanger
drinkRegister.instructions: Mix in spread glass over ice. Strain and pour in shot glass. Sit down before shotting. ENJOY!!

drinkRegister.name: Zima Blaster
drinkRegister.instructions: Fill glass with ice. Pour in Chambord, then fill with Zima. Mix and enjoy.

drinkRegister.name: Buccaneer
drinkRegister.instructions: Pour the corona into an 18oz beer glass pour the bacardi limon into the beer stir very gently

drinkRegister.name: Homemade Kahlua
drinkRegister.instructions: Dissolve sugar in 2 cups of boiling water and add corn syrup. Dissolve the instant coffee in the remaining water. Pour syrup and coffee in a gallon jug. Let it cool. Add vodka and vanilla when cold. For the best result, let the mixture "mature" for 4-5 weeks.

drinkRegister.name: 24k nightmare
drinkRegister.instructions: Add over ice,shake and pour.

drinkRegister.name: Caribbean Boilermaker
drinkRegister.instructions: Pour the Corona into an 18oz beer glass pour the rum into the beer.

drinkRegister.name: Army special
drinkRegister.instructions: Pour Vodka, Gin and lime cordial into glass, and top up with crushed ice. Wait for ice to melt slightly and sip without a straw.

drinkRegister.name: Arizona Twister
drinkRegister.instructions: Just mix in the shots of rum, vodka, and tequila. Add splashes of the three juices, heavy on the pineapple. Top off with grenadine. Crushed ice should already be in glass. Top off the glass with a pineapple wedge.

drinkRegister.name: Baby Guinness
drinkRegister.instructions: Pour Kahlua, almost filling shot glass. Then, carefully pour Baileys, using wall of shot glass. This will give the "Guinness" its "head".

drinkRegister.name: Alice in Wonderland
drinkRegister.instructions: Just mix the three ingredients one to one to one

drinkRegister.name: 501 Blue
drinkRegister.instructions: Mix equal amounts into a glass with ice.

drinkRegister.name: Coke and Drops
drinkRegister.instructions: Take a glass, pour the Coke in the glass, then you take 7 drops of lemon juice. Granish with a lemon slice on the rim of the glass.

drinkRegister.name: Ruby Tuesday
drinkRegister.instructions: Pour gin and cranberry into a highball filled with ice cubes. Add grenadine and stir.

drinkRegister.name: Arctic Mouthwash
drinkRegister.instructions: Blend all ingredients in a blender on high until ice is finely crushed. It should be of a slushy consistency. Pour immediately and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Brain Fart
drinkRegister.instructions: Mix all ingredients together. Slowly and gently. Works best if ice is added to punch bowl and soda's are very cold.

drinkRegister.name: Royal Bitch
drinkRegister.instructions: Into a shot glass layer the Crown Royal on top of the Frangelico.

drinkRegister.name: Citrus Coke
drinkRegister.instructions: Pour half of coke in a glass. Then add Bacardi and top it off with the remaining coke. Stir and drink up!

drinkRegister.name: Smut
drinkRegister.instructions: Throw it all together and serve real cold.

drinkRegister.name: Raspberry Cooler
drinkRegister.instructions: Pour the raspberry vodka and soda into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well.

drinkRegister.name: Amaretto Sunset
drinkRegister.instructions: Shake ingredients in bartender's mixer quickly, just 5 shakes. Strain out ice, serve in glass immediately with a slice of orange.

drinkRegister.name: Cherry Electric Lemonade
drinkRegister.instructions: Now stir vigorously and then pour over a large cup of ice. Now drink it with a straw and stir occasionally.

drinkRegister.name: Girl From Ipanema
drinkRegister.instructions: Add the cachaca, lemon juice and syrup to your boston glass. Add ice and shake until ice cold. Pour into a chilled flute and top-up with Champagne

drinkRegister.name: Ipamena
drinkRegister.instructions: Cut half a lime into pieces, place in a shaker, add the sugar and crush. Measure the passion fruit juice, add it to the shaker and fill up with ice cubes. Close the shaker and shake vigorously. Pour the liquid into a glass, top up with ginger ale, stir with a teaspoon and then garnish the rim of the glass with a slice of lime

drinkRegister.name: Dark Caipirinha
drinkRegister.instructions:
Muddle the sugar into the lime wedges in an old-fashioned glass.
Fill the glass with ice cubes.
Pour the cachaca into the glass.
Stir well.

drinkRegister.name: Jam Donut
drinkRegister.instructions: Coat the rim of a shot glass with sugar using sugar syrup to stick. Add the Chambord raspberry liqueur to the shot glass, and carefully layer the Baileys Irish Cream on top. Serve.

drinkRegister.name: Aviation
drinkRegister.instructions: Add all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well and strain into cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry.

drinkRegister.name: Dirty Martini
drinkRegister.instructions:
Pour the vodka, dry vermouth and olive brine into a cocktail shaker with a handful of ice and shake well.
Rub the rim of a martini glass with the wedge of lemon.
Strain the contents of the cocktail shaker into the glass and add the olive.
A dirty Martini contains a splash of olive brine or olive juice and is typically garnished with an olive.

drinkRegister.name: Duchamp's Punch
drinkRegister.instructions:
Shake all ingredients.
Double strain in a chilled double old fashioned glass with abig ice cube.
Garnish with a couple of lavender sprigs

drinkRegister.name: Bacardi Cocktail
drinkRegister.instructions: Shake together with ice. Strain into glass and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Between The Sheets
drinkRegister.instructions: Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice cubes, shake, strain into chilled cocktail glass.

drinkRegister.name: Casino
drinkRegister.instructions: Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist and a maraschino cherry. Serve without a straw.

drinkRegister.name: Clover Club
drinkRegister.instructions: Dry shake ingredients to emulsify, add ice, shake and served straight up.

drinkRegister.name: Derby
drinkRegister.instructions: Pour all ingredients into a mixing glass with ice. Stir. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a sprig of fresh mint in the drink.

drinkRegister.name: Mary Pickford
drinkRegister.instructions: Shake and strain into a chilled large cocktail glass

drinkRegister.name: Monkey Gland
drinkRegister.instructions: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker, strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

drinkRegister.name: Paradise
drinkRegister.instructions: Shake together over ice. Strain into cocktail glass and serve chilled.

drinkRegister.name: Planter's Punch
drinkRegister.instructions: Pour all ingredients, except the bitters, into shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Pour into large glass, filled with ice. Add Angostura bitters, "on top". Garnish with cocktail cherry and pineapple.

drinkRegister.name: Porto flip
drinkRegister.instructions: Shake ingredients together in a mixer with ice. Strain into glass, garnish and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Stinger
drinkRegister.instructions: Pour in a mixing glass with ice, stir and strain into a cocktail glass. May also be served on rocks in a rocks glass.

drinkRegister.name: White Lady
drinkRegister.instructions: Add all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well and strain into large cocktail glass.

drinkRegister.name: Bellini
drinkRegister.instructions: Pour peach purée into chilled flute, add sparkling wine. Stir gently.

drinkRegister.name: Cosmopolitan
drinkRegister.instructions: Add all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well and double strain into large cocktail glass. Garnish with lime wheel.

drinkRegister.name: French 75
drinkRegister.instructions: Combine gin, sugar, and lemon juice in a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake vigorously and strain into a chilled champagne glass. Top up with Champagne. Stir gently.

drinkRegister.name: French Connection
drinkRegister.instructions: Pour all ingredients directly into old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Stir gently.

drinkRegister.name: Golden dream
drinkRegister.instructions: Shake with cracked ice. Strain into glass and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Grasshopper
drinkRegister.instructions: Pour ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake briskly and then strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

drinkRegister.name: Hemingway Special
drinkRegister.instructions: Pour all ingredients into a shaker with ice. Shake.

drinkRegister.name: Horse's Neck
drinkRegister.instructions: Pour brandy and ginger ale directly into highball glass with ice cubes. Stir gently. Garnish with lemon zest. If desired, add dashes of Angostura Bitter.

drinkRegister.name: Kir
drinkRegister.instructions: Add the crème de cassis to the bottom of the glass, then top up with wine.

drinkRegister.name: Long Island Iced Tea
drinkRegister.instructions: Mix all contents in a highball glass and sitr gently. Add dash of Coca-Cola for the coloring and garnish with lemon or lime twist.

drinkRegister.name: Mimosa
drinkRegister.instructions: Ensure both ingredients are well chilled, then mix into the glass. Serve cold.

drinkRegister.name: Mint Julep
drinkRegister.instructions: In a highball glass gently muddle the mint, sugar and water. Fill the glass with cracked ice, add Bourbon and stir well until the glass is well frosted. Garnish with a mint sprig.

drinkRegister.name: Pina Colada
drinkRegister.instructions: Mix with crushed ice in blender until smooth. Pour into chilled glass, garnish and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Rose
drinkRegister.instructions: Shake together in a cocktail shaker, then strain into chilled glass. Garnish and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Barracuda
drinkRegister.instructions: Shake pour ingredients with ice. Strain into glass, top with Sparkling wine.

drinkRegister.name: Bramble
drinkRegister.instructions: Fill glass with crushed ice. Build gin, lemon juice and simple syrup over. Stir, and then pour blackberry liqueur over in a circular fashion to create marbling effect. Garnish with two blackberries and lemon slice.

drinkRegister.name: Dark and Stormy
drinkRegister.instructions: In a highball glass filled with ice add 6cl dark rum and top with ginger beer. Garnish with lime wedge.

drinkRegister.name: Espresso Martini
drinkRegister.instructions: Pour ingredients into shaker filled with ice, shake vigorously, and strain into chilled martini glass

drinkRegister.name: French Martini
drinkRegister.instructions: Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Squeeze oil from lemon peel onto the drink.

drinkRegister.name: Russian Spring Punch
drinkRegister.instructions: Pour the ingredients into an highball glass, top with Sparkling wine.

drinkRegister.name: Spritz
drinkRegister.instructions: Build into glass over ice, garnish and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Tommy's Margarita
drinkRegister.instructions: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

drinkRegister.name: Vampiro
drinkRegister.instructions: Vampiros may be made in a tall glass or an old fashioned glass. Bartenders may first "rim" the glass with Kosher Salt, which is done by placing a layer of Kosher Salt on a chopping board, moistening the glass' rim with lime juice or water, and then placing the upside down glass rim onto the Kosher Salt, so that the salt sticks to the moistened rim. The second step is to fill half the glass with ice and add one or two shooter glasses full of high quality Tequila. The next stage is to add the flavouring elements. This is done by squeezing a fresh lime into the glass, adding a few grains of salt, adding citrus-flavoured soda pop, until the glass is 4/5 full, and then adding spicy Viuda de Sanchez (or orange juice, lime juice and pico de gallo). The final step is to stir the ingredients so that the flavours are properly blended.

drinkRegister.name: Vesper
drinkRegister.instructions: Shake over ice until well chilled, then strain into a deep goblet and garnish with a thin slice of lemon peel.

drinkRegister.name: Yellow Bird
drinkRegister.instructions: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass

drinkRegister.name: Butter Baby
drinkRegister.instructions: Blend together in a blender. Serve in a chilled Beer mug with Fresh Blueberries and caramel for topping.

drinkRegister.name: Boozy Snickers Milkshake
drinkRegister.instructions: Place the snickers bars in a plastic bag and roll over them with a rolling pin until crushed. Add crushed snickers pieces, ice cream, milk, caramel sauce, chocolate sauce, and chocolate liquor to a blender. Blend until shake is thick and frothy. Pour into glasses and top with chocolate liquor and whip cream.

drinkRegister.name: A1
drinkRegister.instructions: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker, mix and serve over ice into a chilled glass.

drinkRegister.name: Abbey Martini
drinkRegister.instructions: Put all ingredients into a shaker and mix, then strain contents into a chilled cocktail glass.

drinkRegister.name: Absolutely Fabulous
drinkRegister.instructions: Mix the Vodka and Cranberry juice together in a shaker and strain into a glass. Top up with Champagne.

drinkRegister.name: Ace
drinkRegister.instructions: Shake all the ingredients in a cocktail shaker and ice then strain in a cold glass.

drinkRegister.name: Adam & Eve
drinkRegister.instructions: Shake together all the ingredients and strain into a cold glass.

drinkRegister.name: Addington
drinkRegister.instructions: Mix both the vermouth's in a shaker and strain into a cold glass. Top up with a squirt of Soda Water.

drinkRegister.name: Addison
drinkRegister.instructions: Shake together all the ingredients and strain into a cold glass.

drinkRegister.name: Adios Amigos Cocktail
drinkRegister.instructions: Shake together all the ingredients and strain into a cold glass.

drinkRegister.name: Gin Rickey
drinkRegister.instructions: Half-fill a tall glass with ice. Mix the gin and Grenadine together and pour over the ice. Add the lime or lemon juice and top off with soda water. Decorate the glass with lime and/or lemon slices.

drinkRegister.name: Salted Toffee Martini
drinkRegister.instructions:
Add ice, toffee gin, chocolate liqueur and Amaretto to a cocktail shaker and shake vigorously. 
Pour the chocolate syrup into a saucer and dip the top of a martini glass into the sauce. Grate some of the Willie\'s sea salt chocolate into another saucer and dip the coated glass, so the flakes stick to the sauce, creating a chocolate rim!
Pour the contents of the shaker into your chocolatey glass and sprinkle with more grated chocolate - enjoy!

drinkRegister.name: Hunter's Moon
drinkRegister.instructions: Put the Bombay Sapphire, Martini Bianco, sugar syrup & blackberries in a cocktail shaker with lots of ice and shake vigorously before pouring into a balloon glass, topping up with lemonade and garnishing with a wedge of orange.

drinkRegister.name: Zombie
drinkRegister.instructions:
Blend at high speed for no more than 5 seconds.

Pour into a glass, add ice cubes to fill, then add the garnish.

*Donn’s mix: Bring 3 crushed cinnamon sticks, 1 cup of sugar and 1 cup of water to a boil, stirring until the sugar is dissolved.

Simmer for 2 minutes, then remove from the heat and let sit for at least 2 hours before straining into a clean glass bottle.

Then add 1 part of the syrup and 2 parts of fresh grapefruit juice together.

drinkRegister.name: Bombay Cassis
drinkRegister.instructions:
Add the Bombay Sapphire, Crème de Cassis and lime juice to a balloon glass and swirl well to mix.
Fill the glass with good quality cubed ice.
Top up with chilled and freshly opened Fever-Tree Ginger Beer.
Gently stir to combine, top with a gently squeezed lime wedge and finish with a fresh ginger slice.

drinkRegister.name: Rosemary Blue
drinkRegister.instructions:
1) Add the Bombay Sapphire, Blue Curacao, rosemary sprig and gently squeezed lemon wedge to a balloon glass. Swirl well to combine.
2) Fill with cubed ice and top with the Fever-Tree Light Tonic Water.
3) Gently fold with a bar spoon to mix.

drinkRegister.name: Empellón Cocina's Fat-Washed Mezcal
drinkRegister.instructions:
To ensure that your pork fat is just as delicious as theirs, here’s their adobo marinade and what to do with it (you’ll also need a rack of ribs):

4 ancho chiles, 8 guajillo chiles and 4 chipotle chiles, plus 4 cloves roasted garlic, half a cup of cider vinegar, a quarter teaspoon of Mexican oregano, 1 teaspoon of ground black pepper, a whole clove, a quarter teaspoon of ground cinnamon and a half teaspoon of ground cumin.

Toast the dried chiles and soak in water for at least an hour until they are rehydrated. Drain and discard the soaking liquid. Combine the soaked chiles with the remaining ingredients and purée until smooth.

Cold smoke a rack of baby back pork ribs by taking a large hotel pan with woodchips on one side and charcoal on the other. Place another, smaller, pan with pork ribs, above the charcoal/woodchip pan. Ignite the charcoal, being careful to not ignite the woodchips. Cover both pans with foil and allow to smoke for 10-15 minutes, until desired level of smoke is achieved, then coat with adobo marinade and wrap in tin foil prior to placing ribs in a 300 degree oven for 7 hours. When the ribs have cooled, strain off the fat and use for the infusion.

If you’re having a hard time coming up to the same kind of volume of fat, make up the balance with pork lard from a butcher. To get the same depth of flavor without the ribs, heat up the fat in a pot with a few spoons of the marinade.

Once you’ve got your tub of seasoned pork fat in cooled liquid form, pour equal amounts of Ilegal Joven mezcal and fat into a sealable container. Seal the container and give it a really good shake, then put it in the freezer overnight. When the whole thing is separated and congealed, pour it through a fine mesh chinoise. If you don’t have a chinoise, try a fine mesh strainer, or if you don’t have one of those, try spooning off most of the fat. There will be some beads of orange fat left in the strained mezcal: run that through a few layers of cheesecloth (or coffee filters in a pinch) to get rid of the last of it.

The mezcal is now ready for drinking, straight-up or in a cocktail. 

Habanero tincture

Slice habaneros and add 2 ounces Ilegal Joven mezcal.
Allow to sit overnight or until desired level of heat is achieved.
Cocktail

Combine mezcal and chocolate liqueur in a mixing glass with ice and stir for 45 seconds.
Strain into chilled coupe.
Carefully "sink" the coffee liqueur down the inside of the coupe over a spoon.
Garnish with 5 drops habanero tincture.

drinkRegister.name: The Last Word
drinkRegister.instructions: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

drinkRegister.name: French Negroni
drinkRegister.instructions:
Add ice to a shaker and pour in all ingredients.
Using a bar spoon, stir 40 to 45 revolutions or until thoroughly chilled.
Strain into a martini glass or over ice into a rocks glass. Garnish with orange twist.

drinkRegister.name: Pegu Club
drinkRegister.instructions: Shake, strain, up, cocktail glass

drinkRegister.name: Corpse Reviver #2
drinkRegister.instructions: Shake, strain, straight up, cocktail glass rinsed with absinthe

drinkRegister.name: Boulevardier
drinkRegister.instructions: Stir with ice, strain, garnish and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Greyhound
drinkRegister.instructions:
Add the vodka to a Collins glass filled with ice.
Top with grapefruit juice and stir.

drinkRegister.name: Paloma
drinkRegister.instructions: Stir together and serve over ice.

drinkRegister.name: Bijou
drinkRegister.instructions: Stir in mixing glass with ice and strain

drinkRegister.name: Gimlet
drinkRegister.instructions:
Add all the ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice.

Shake, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass or an Old Fashioned glass filled with fresh ice.

Garnish with a lime wheel.

drinkRegister.name: Martinez 2
drinkRegister.instructions:
Add all ingredients to a mixing glass and fill with ice.

Stir until chilled, and strain into a chilled coupe glass.

drinkRegister.name: Oatmeal Cookie
drinkRegister.instructions:
Just mix it all together.
It's meant to be a shot, but it works just fine as a proper adult-sized drink over lots of ice.

Tastes like an oatmeal cookie.

drinkRegister.name: Bahama Mama
drinkRegister.instructions:
Add 2 parts club soda or more or less to taste.

Mix it all together and pour over a bunch of ice. Drink with a straw.

drinkRegister.name: Blue Hurricane
drinkRegister.instructions:
If each part is 1/2 oz then use about 2.5 cups of ice.

Blend it all together. 
Drink it with a big straw if you have one.

drinkRegister.name: The Laverstoke
drinkRegister.instructions:
1) Squeeze two lime wedges into a balloon glass then add the cordial, Bombay Sapphire and MARTINI Rosso Vermouth, swirl to mix.

2) Fully fill the glass with cubed ice and stir to chill.

3) Top with Fever-Tree Ginger Ale and gently stir again to combine.

4) Garnish with a snapped ginger slice and an awoken mint sprig.

drinkRegister.name: Brigadier
drinkRegister.instructions: Mix ingredients in a warmed mug and stir.

drinkRegister.name: The Jimmy Conway
drinkRegister.instructions:
Fill glass with ice
Pour in The Irishman and Disaronno
Fill to the top with Cranberry Juice
Garnish with a slice of lemon…Enjoy!

drinkRegister.name: Old Pal
drinkRegister.instructions: Chill cocktail glass. Add ingredients to a mixing glass, and fill 2/3 full with ice. Stir about 20 seconds. Empty cocktail glass and strain into the glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon peel.

drinkRegister.name: Tipperary
drinkRegister.instructions: Stir over ice. Strain into chilled glass. Cut a wide swath of orange peel, and express the orange oils over the drink. Discard orange twist.

drinkRegister.name: Penicillin
drinkRegister.instructions: Shake blended Scotch, lemon juice, honey syrup and ginger syrup with ice. Strain over large ice in chilled rocks glass. Float smoky Scotch on top (be sure to use a smoky Scotch such as an Islay single malt). Garnish with candied ginger.

drinkRegister.name: Corn n Oil
drinkRegister.instructions: Cut the half lime in half again. Add the lime, falernum, and bitters to a rocks glass. Muddle. Add the rum. (Aged Barbados rum such as Plantation 5 Year is recommended). Add ice and stir. Float the blackstrap rum on top. Serve with a straw.

drinkRegister.name: A Furlong Too Late
drinkRegister.instructions: Pour the rum and ginger beer into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Garnish with the lemon twist.

drinkRegister.name: A Night In Old Mandalay
drinkRegister.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the light rum, añejo rum, orange juice, and lemon juice. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Top with the ginger ale. Garnish with the lemon twist.

drinkRegister.name: A. J.
drinkRegister.instructions: Shake ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Abbey Cocktail
drinkRegister.instructions: Shake all ingredients (except for the cherry) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with the cherry and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Abilene
drinkRegister.instructions: Pour all of the ingredients into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well.

drinkRegister.name: Acapulco
drinkRegister.instructions: Combine and shake all ingredients (except mint) with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Add the sprig of mint and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Adam
drinkRegister.instructions: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

drinkRegister.name: Adonis Cocktail
drinkRegister.instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain contents into a cocktail glass, and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Affair
drinkRegister.instructions: Pour schnapps, orange juice, and cranberry juice over ice in a highball glass. Top with club soda and serve.

drinkRegister.name: Affinity
drinkRegister.instructions: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.
